metadata.title: CVE-2021-46960 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: cifs:Return correct error code from smb2_get_enc_key Avoid a warning if theerror percolates back up: [440700.376476] CIFS VFS: \\otters.example.comcrypt_message: Could not get encryption key [440700.386947] ------------[cut here ]------------ [440700.386948] err = 1 [440700.386977] WARNING:CPU: 11 PID: 2733 at/build/linux-hwe-5.4-p6lk6L/linux-hwe-5.4-5.4.0/lib/errseq.c:74errseq_set+0x5c/0x70 ... [440700.397304] CPU: 11 PID: 2733 Comm: tarTainted: G OE 5.4.0-70-generic #78~18.04.1-Ubuntu ... [440700.397334] CallTrace: [440700.397346] __filemap_set_wb_err+0x1a/0x70 [440700.397419]cifs_writepages+0x9c7/0xb30 [cifs] [440700.397426] do_writepages+0x4b/0xe0[440700.397444] __filemap_fdatawrite_range+0xcb/0x100 [440700.397455]filemap_write_and_wait+0x42/0xa0 [440700.397486] cifs_setattr+0x68b/0xf30[cifs] [440700.397493] notify_change+0x358/0x4a0 [440700.397500]utimes_common+0xe9/0x1c0 [440700.397510] do_utimes+0xc5/0x150[440700.397520] __x64_sys_utimensat+0x88/0xd0

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
